des.title: What I do
des.body: Graphic Designer with more than 7 years of experience, I specialize in Web Design and UI/UX but I've also done designs for social media, motion graphics and branding. Most of my work involved personal/business websites and landping pages. My focus is on creating designs that are visually appealing but also functional and accessible. I'm currently providing my services at [**Endes**](https://www.endesweb.com)

dev.title: What I do
dev.body: As a Web Developer I have more than 5 years of experience, coming from a Graphic Design background I specialize in creating personal/business websites and landing pages, I have knowledge of the essentials like vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as older standards like jQuery, although in the last years I've switched to modern frameworks such as React, being able to ensure responsiveness, fast & proper loading, clear UI/UX, accessibility, and engagement. I'm also experienced with backend technologies and integrating them with the frontend. I'm currently providing my services on [**Endes**](https://www.endesweb.com)

projects.title: Contrast Checker
projects.desc: Web app made using React, it compares two colors and checks if they fulfill WCAG standards. The app also provides an option to directly pick from TailwindCSS colors, which is useful for both designers and frontend developers.

projects.title: Kanji App
projects.desc: App made to memorize and learn japanese kanji based on the kyōiku system.

projects.title: Runic Transliteration App
projects.desc: Web app which takes latin input and converts it to different runic systems.

projects.title: Gabriel Vénica & Consultores Asociados
projects.desc: Corporate website for a consultancy firm.

projects.title: Venica
projects.desc: Website for Gabriel Vénica & Consutlores Asociados, a consultancy firm. Our work consisted in rebuilding an old Adobe Flash website with modern technologies, along with an overhaul in its institutional design. The site also features blog posts and updatable content.

list: Content design for Social Media (Facebook posts, Instagram posts and stories)
Optimization of image and video files
Edition of content created by previous designers and re-creation of the same content from scratch in case editables were not available.
Designing highly-engaging content for Social Media (Facebook posts, Instagram posts and stories).
Optimization of image and video files
Creation of websites from scratch (mostly landing pages, but also some e-commerce and blogs).
Implementation of the UI, sometimes following an already existing design (made by me or by a previous designer).
Implementation of some backend like Wordpress as a CMS.
Integration with backend using AJAX for asynchronous data retrieval, ensuring seamless communication between the frontend and backend.
Ensuring the sites are responsive and work on all devices tested.
Optimization of code and content, remove unnecessary content, choosing the best filetypes possibles in cases of images/videos.
Adaptation to the widest range of users and following WCAG guidelines

Communication with clients, understanding their needs, translating technical to non-technical ones, providing a clear understanding and alignment on project goals and timelines, maintain a regular communication to address concerns, provide updates, and ensure client satisfaction
Testing the websites with users and getting user feedback, and implementing improvements when necessary.
Implementation of SEO best practices, keeping track of SEO strategies using analytics tools.

Instructing clients on website maintenance and content management systems, helping clients to manage and update their websites independently. Developed user-friendly documentation and tutorials to facilitate a smooth transition and ongoing self-sufficiency.
